com.artemis.system

Class DispersedIntervalEntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.BaseEntitySystem
        • com.artemis.EntitySystem
          • com.artemis.system.DispersedIntervalEntitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.artemis.EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener

    public abstract class DispersedIntervalEntitySystem
extends com.artemis.EntitySystem
    An EntitySystem that will wait for an interval then queue all entities to be updated over the duration of the next interval.
